ISS Tracker is an android application that allows you to track the position of the International Space Station (ISS) and find out what astronauts are currently in space. The application comes with a notification system that can alert you whenever ISS approaches your location.\n\n Make sure to rate me! Click here.
Space Station Tracker\nKiarash Torkian\nMozilla Public License Version 2.0
HSV-Alpha Color Picker\nMartin Stone\nApache License Version 2.0

Version: 1.0

- Initial Product
 - Map view
 - ISS icon updating with a timer
Version: 1.2\n\n- Fixed some layout issues on android devices of 4.4 – 4.0

Version: 1.3

- Fixed the layout of loading icon.
- Fixed a issue where the map would not have loaded on some instances.

Version: 1.4

- Ads are now optional
- Significantly reduced the app's size
- Across app visual change
- Added more features

Version: 1.5

- App should respond much faster
- Supports API 14 instead of 17
- Removed two permissions
- General bugs and library updates

Version: 2.0

- Can now access ISS's live feed
- Improved layout through the app
- A small guide for new users
- Fixed an issue where services in settings weren't updating correctly
- General bug fixes and improvements

Version: 2.1

- Improved Who's in Space
- Click Astros for more info
- Fix service crashing when having connectivity problems
- General improvements

Version: 2.11

- Updated Help page
- New Icon
- Improved layout throughout the app
- General improvements

Version: 2.2

- App much faster / responsive
- Removed ads from some pages
- Updated the Astro info page
- Bug fixes & general improvements

Version: 3.0

- Much more customization
- Implemented printing of additional info
- Map type
- ISS no longer force locked
- General improvements

Version: 3.0

- All activities can rotate
- Less memory usage
- Small improvements

Version: 3.2

- Improved People in Space layout
- Astronauts now have links to their Twitter and wiki
- Full page ads (Can be disabled/enabled from settings w/o any purchase)
- Couple of major bug fixes

Version: 3.3

HAPPY NEW YEAR FOLKS
- Additional settings such as text size and a better support for color picking to support all colors and transparencies.
- Layout improvements, mostly on settings
- Fixed settings descriptions getting cut off on tablets/bigger screens
- Updated libraries used by the app
- General improvements and bug fixes

Version: 3.31

- Small bug fixes.

NOTE: If you already had the app, this update may break your application. For the time being, uninstalling and reinstalling the app will fix the issue.

Version: 3.32

- Crash on start for existing users
- What's new on Help page. (You looking at it silly)

Version: 3.4

- Map won't reset on orientation change
- Fixed a crash caused by slow connections
